text: After a month of delays, the number of vaccinations in B.C. is set to see a dramatic increase in the coming weeks. Prof. @HeidiTworek (SPPGA; @UBC_History) addresses #vaccine hesitancy as #COVID19 vaccines roll out to the general population. More @CBCNews: https://t.co/oydjFNdySJ https://t.co/A2Y0G0Zgen
